category.template: Hi there! I'm a simple AIML chatbot. How can I help you?
Hello! Nice to meet you. What would you like to know?
I'm a simple AIML chatbot. You can call me Bot!
I'm doing great! Thanks for asking. How are you doing today?
I can answer simple questions using AIML patterns. Try asking me about the weather, time, or just say hello!
I don't have access to real-time data, but you can check your device's clock!
I can't check the weather right now, but I hope it's nice where you are!
Sure! You can ask me simple questions like "hello", "what is your name", "how are you", or "what can you do".
You're very welcome! I'm happy to help. Is there anything else you'd like to know?
Goodbye! It was nice chatting with you. Come back anytime!
